8.ara-name: كتاب الصوم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Sahl bin Sa'd narrated that:The Prophet said: "There is a gate in Paradise called Ar-Raiyyan, those who fast shall be invited into it, and whoever was among those who fasted, then he will enter it; and whoever enters it, he will never thirst again

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي فَضْلِ الصَّوْمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Virtues Of Fasting
